text: bl alhwla' almushrikin biallah shuraka' fi shrkhm wdlalthm, abtdeu lahum min aldiyn walshrk ma lam yadhan bih allh? walawla qada' allah waqadarah b'imhalhm, wa'an laa yueajil lahum aleadhab fi aldnya, laqudi baynahum btejyl aleadhab lhm. wa'iin alkafirin biallah lahum yawm alqiamat eadhab mulim mwje
